description:
Update: Touchpad support and bugfixes. Enyo rewrite is in progress.

wIRC is the premier IRC client for webOS devices.

Internet Relay Chat (IRC) is a widely used real-time Internet text messaging (chat) or synchronous conferencing protocol. IRC is mainly designed for group communication in discussion forums, called channels, but also allows one-to-one communication via private message as well as chat and data transfer (including file sharing). Thanks to the true multi-tasking ability of webOS, wIRC supports all these features of IRC and more, including multiple servers and chats at the same time.

If you download and use wIRC please pop into the #wirc or #webos-internals channels on freenode & say hi.
